checkInstallation: brew list $( [ "${{ app.fields.isCask }}" = "true" ] && echo '--cask' ) "$( [ -n "${{ app.version }}" ] && echo "${{ app.fields.formulaOrCaskName }}@${{ app.version }}" || echo "${{ app.fields.formulaOrCaskName }}" )"
checkVersion: brew list --version $( [ "${{ app.fields.isCask }}" = "true" ] && echo '--cask' ) "$( [ -n "${{ app.version }}" ] && echo "${{ app.fields.formulaOrCaskName }}@${{ app.version }}" || echo "${{ app.fields.formulaOrCaskName }}" )" | awk '{print $2}'

formulaOrCaskName.title: Formula/Cask
formulaOrCaskName.description: Name of the formula/cask you want to use

isCask.title: Is Cask
isCask.description: Specify if this is a Cask and not a Formula
